elements.expression:
kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN AverageCostForTwo <= 50 THEN 'Cheap'
    WHEN AverageCostForTwo > 50 AND AverageCostForTwo <= 100 THEN 'Cheap/Medium'
    WHEN AverageCostForTwo > 100 AND AverageCostForTwo <= 250 THEN 'Medium'
    WHEN AverageCostForTwo > 250 AND AverageCostForTwo <= 1000 THEN 'Pricy'
    ELSE 'Super Pricy'
  END AS price_category,
  COUNT(*) as restaurant_count
FROM \"restaurants\" 
GROUP BY price_category
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    price_category 
    WHEN 'Cheap' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Cheap/Medium' THEN 2
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Pricy' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Super Pricy' THEN 5
  END"
| pointseries x="price_category" y="restaurant_count" text=""
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle bars=0.75 color="#1ea6dc" lines="0"} legend=false xaxis={axisConfig position="bottom"} 
  font={font align="left" color="#1785b0" family="'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', Lucida, Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} yaxis={axisConfig position="left"}
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN AggregateRating > 4 THEN 'Good'
    WHEN AggregateRating > 1.5 AND AggregateRating <= 4 THEN 'Medium'
    ELSE 'Bad'
  END AS rating_category,
  COUNT(*) AS restaurant_count
FROM \"restaurants\"
GROUP BY rating_category
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    rating_category 
    WHEN 'Good' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 2
    WHEN 'Bad' THEN 3
  END"
| pointseries color="rating_category" size="max(restaurant_count)"
| pie 
  palette={palette "#771155" "#AA4488" "#CC99BB" "#114477" "#4477AA" "#77AADD" "#117777" "#44AAAA" "#77CCCC" "#117744" "#44AA77" "#88CCAA" "#777711" "#AAAA44" "#DDDD77" "#774411" "#AA7744" "#DDAA77" "#771122" "#AA4455" "#DD7788" gradient=false}
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT FORMAT(MAX(Date), 'yyyy-MM-dd') as latest_review FROM \"restaurants\""
| math "latest_review"
| metric "Latest Review" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#3f9939" family="'Hoefler Text', Garamond, Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" italic=false size=24 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#4fbf48" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="yyyy-MM-dd"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql query="SELECT 
  SUM(Votes) AS total_reviews
FROM \"restaurants\"
"
| math "total_reviews"
| metric "Reviews" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#3f9939" family="'Hoefler Text', Garamond, Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" italic=false size=24 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#4fbf48" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql query="SELECT MAX(AverageCostForTwo) as max_price
FROM restaurants
"
| math "max_price"
| metric "Average Cost" 
  metricFont={font align="center" color="#3f9939" family="'Hoefler Text', Garamond, Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" italic=false size=24 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="center" color="#4fbf48" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=14 underline=false weight="normal"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| demodata
| markdown "### Welcome to the Markdown element

Good news! You're already connected to some demo data!

The data table contains
**{{rows.length}} rows**, each containing
 the following columns:
{{#each columns}}
 **{{name}}**
{{/each}}

You can use standard Markdown in here, but you can also access your piped-in data using Handlebars. If you want to know more, check out the [Handlebars documentation](https://ela.st/handlebars-docs).

#### Enjoy!" | render

kibana
| selectFilter
| essql 
  query="SELECT 
  RestaurantName AS \"Restaurant Name\",
  Votes AS \"Number of Votes\",
  RatingText AS \"Rating Text\"
FROM \"restaurants\"
ORDER BY Votes DESC"
| table perPage=5 showHeader=true 
  font={font align="left" color="#c19628" family="Baskerville, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" italic=false size=16 underline=false weight="bold"}
| render

essql query="SELECT City FROM restaurants GROUP BY City ORDER BY City"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="City" filterColumn="City"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| demodata
| markdown "### Each Restaurants Review"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| demodata
| markdown "### Different Catgory of Price"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter
| demodata
| markdown 
  "* Cheap: (0,50)
* Cheap/Medium:(50,100]
* Medium:(100,250]
* Pricy:(250,1000]
* Super Pricy: (1000,+ulimit)"
| render

kibana
| selectFilter

"
